metadata.title: CVE-2021-41183 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: jQuery-UI is the official jQuery user interface library. Prior to version 1.13.0, accepting the value of various `*Text` options of the Datepicker widget from untrusted sources may execute untrusted code. The issue is fixed in jQuery UI 1.13.0. The values passed to various `*Text` options are now always treated as pure text, not HTML. A workaround is to not accept the value of the `*Text` options from untrusted sources.

criterions.comment: jqueryui package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
